title: 148863016.its Not Always Great But Thats Okay
excerpt: Writing everyday, you inevitably have posts that come up short and miss the mark.

children.text: Writing everyday, you inevitably have posts that come up short and miss the mark.
But it turns out that’s okay.
is what allows you to come upon the post’s worth sharing--the one’s that make making them worth it to begin with.
Not all of your attempts can be best hits, nor should they be. But if you keep at it, you’ll have more than enough 'hits' to make up for the 'bad' ones.
